metadata.title: CVE-2019-9805 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A latent vulnerability exists in the Prio library where data may be read from uninitialized memory for some functions, leading to potential memory corruption. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 66.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '66.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
